title: 94/450/EC: Commission Decision of 24 June 1994 amending Decision 93/74/EEC concerning the status of Denmark with regard to infectious haematopoietic necrosis and viral haemorrhagic septicaemia
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 24 June 1994 amending Decision 93/74/EEC concerning the status of Denmark with regard to infectious haematopoietic necrosis and viral haemorrhagic septicaemia (94/450/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In the Annex to Decision 93/74/EEC, 'Grejs AA' is added to the first column, and 'Bygholm AA' is added to the second column.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 June 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 46, 19. 2. 1991, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 175, 19. 7. 1993, p. 34.
(3) OJ No L 27, 4. 2. 1993, p. 35.
